io.amelia.looper

Class BlockingTask<E extends java.lang.Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amelia.looper.BlockingTask<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LooperTask<E>

    public final class BlockingTask<E extends java.lang.Exception>
extends java.lang.Object
implements LooperTask<E>
    Provides a runnable that blocks until the wrapped runnable is executed. Be sure to pass this Runnable to the executor before calling postAndWait(long) or else it will hang.
